lead_paragraph: Someone made off with 22 helmets from Walnut Ridge’s equipment room, so a Riddell salesman put in a rush order for replacements. The team then won its season opener.

headline.main: Ohio Team Recovers From Helmet Theft
headline.print_headline: Ohio Team Recovers From Helmet Theft
